org.amv.access.sdk.spi.bluetooth

Interface BroadcastState

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SimpleBroadcastState

    public interface BroadcastState
    An interface representing a broadcast state.

    A broadcast state can either be

    • idle (no broadcasting is done)
    • broadcasting (actively looking for devices)

    Additionally isBluetoothEnabled() indicates whether bluetooth is currently available. Unless bluetooth is available isBroadcasting() will never return true and the broadcast remains in state 'idle'.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      boolean isBluetoothEnabled() 
      boolean isBroadcasting() 
      boolean isIdle()
